short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open multiple devices screens for test or debug a website across devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension enables front-end developers to view and test multiple screen sizes in a single interface, making it easier to develop responsive websites and applications.
